correo.descripcion: If you have forgotten your password, don't worry. You can recover access to your account by following the steps on this page.
correo.instruccion_correo: Enter the email address associated with your account, and we will send a reset link to your email.

login.descripcion: Manage inventory, orders, and deliveries efficiently with the ICS Inventory System.
login.instruccion_login: Enter your email and password to access your account.

otp.descripcion: We have sent a one-time password (OTP) to your registered email address.
otp.instruccion_otp: To proceed, please enter the OTP that we have sent to your email.

restablecer_contrasena.descripcion: For security reasons, create a new password that you haven't used before.
restablecer_contrasena.instruccion_contrasena: Enter your new password to regain access to your account.

acceso_denegado.mensaje: You do not have permission to access this page.

validaciones.contrasenaInvalida: The password must be at least 8 characters long, with a capital letter, a lowercase letter, and a number.
